thread.title: Our third visit to Alhambra Hotel
thread.title_full: Our third visit to Alhambra Hotel - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SabiGull
title: Our third visit to Alhambra Hotel
text:
We enjoyed our visit very much again. Our room was nice and cosy, clean and comfortable. The whole team was friendly - Thank you especially to the breakfast team! St Pancras and Kings Cross Station is across the road - very close! We will definitely come again...
Room Tip: Room on the second floor has a nice street view See more room tips
